**Smart Toothbrush with Built-in AI Assistant**: Design a toothbrush with a built-in AI assistant that provides personalized oral care recommendations based on the user's brushing habits, dietary habits, and medical history. The AI assistant can detect plaque, tartar, and gum inflammation, and provide real-time feedback on brushing technique. It can also integrate with popular health and fitness apps to track oral health progress.

**Toothbrush with Built-in UV Sanitizer**: Develop a toothbrush with a built-in UV sanitizer that kills bacteria and germs on the toothbrush head, reducing the risk of reinfection and promoting a healthier oral environment. The UV sanitizer can be activated after each use, and the toothbrush can be charged wirelessly.

**Toothbrush with Integrated Flossing System**: Create a toothbrush with an integrated flossing system that allows users to floss their teeth in seconds. The system can include a small flossing thread that is released from the toothbrush handle, making it easy to navigate between teeth and below the gumline.

**Toothbrush with Built-in Whitening System**: Design a toothbrush with a built-in whitening system that uses gentle abrasives and mild bleaching agents to whiten teeth. The system can be adjusted to suit individual teeth sensitivity, and the toothbrush can be programmed to only activate the whitening system for a certain amount of time each day.

**Toothbrush with Augmented Reality Feedback**: Develop a toothbrush with an augmented reality (AR) display that provides users with real-time feedback on their brushing technique, including visualizations of plaque, tartar, and gum inflammation. The AR display can be projected onto a mirror or screen, allowing users to see their teeth and gums in a new light. </s> [INST]
